amendment.description: Amendment requires the use of life-cycle cost analysis in the design or lease of federal buildings receiving at least 50% Federal funding and for which construction cost is over $1 million or the space to be leased is over 25,000 square feet.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 112-385 to require the use of life-cycle cost analysis in the design or lease of federal buildings receiving at least 50% Federal funding and which construction cost is over $1,000,000 or the space to be leased is over 25,000 square feet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carnahan amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
